import EventEmitter from'./EventEmitter.js';export default class Time extends EventEmitter{/**
     * Constructor
     */constructor(){super();this.start=Date.now();this.current=this.start;this.elapsed=0;this.delta=16;this.tick=this.tick.bind(this);this.tick();}/**
     * Tick
     */tick(){this.ticker=window.requestAnimationFrame(this.tick);const current=Date.now();this.delta=current-this.current;this.elapsed=current-this.start;this.current=current;if(this.delta>60){this.delta=60;}this.trigger('tick');}/**
     * Stop
     */stop(){window.cancelAnimationFrame(this.ticker);}}
